subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Margaret Downey/ADS Tech Instant FM Device/IKnowYou.mp3 
  Uploaded by : itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
  Description : Installed the ADS Tech Instant FM device on my XP computer yesterday.  Used the Snaptune One s/w to do a manual sweep and connected with one of my techs.  After I say his name, I'm hearing, "I KNOW YOU." Also, sounds 'sort of' like my name being said right after I say, "David?"  Raw clip.   

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/ADS%20Tech%20Instant%20FM%20Device/IKnowYou.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...>
